page.title: 10Events
page.content: There are a number of annual events held in our area, and most of them aim to raise money for different organisations.The church holds an { {Autumn Bazaar}and a{Spring Sale } in the village hall at Kingsdown,in order to raise money for the church or a worthwhile charity Project.This year the proceeds of the bazaar went towards the Ethiopian Famine Appeal.The {P.T.A. Fete }is held in the summer term. This year they raised Â£680.{Kingsdown Wissant Society organise an annual exchange visit for one weekend each year with the French Twinning Committee. {The Kingdown Garden Show}is organized by the Garden Society each summer in the village hall.They make and show miniature gardens,bouquets,house plants etc. .
